id - The id of the line to be rendered and returned.

create

public static void create(long budgetId,
                          Line body)
Takes a budget, and the JSON representation of a Line and creates the Line and saves it to that budget.

Parameters:
budgetId - The Budget that the line is to be associated with.
body - The JSON representation of the line that is to be created.

sublines

public static void sublines(long lineId)
Returns all of the sublines associated with a line,

Parameters:
lineId - the Id of the line that we want all of the sublines of.

expenses

public static void expenses(long budgetId)
Returns all of the expense lines associated with a budget,

Parameters:
budgetId - The id of the budget that we want to get all of the associated expense lines from.

incomes

public static void incomes(long budgetId)
Returns all the income lines associated with a budget.

Parameters:
budgetId - The id of the budget that we want to get all of the associated expense lines from.
